context:
### Idiom: 南郭处士
### Meaning: 比喻无真正的才干而混在行家里面充数的人。同滥竽充数”。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

Translated by gpt4; Corpus: wikipedia
source: ”这是《韩非子》中滥竽充数故事另一个版本，通行版本是齐宣王让人吹竽，一定要三百人一起演奏。南郭处士请求替宣王吹竽，宣王高兴，伙食待遇和那几百位同等标准。宣王死后，齐湣王立。
target: "This is another version of the story of 'Pretending to Play the Yu' from 'Han Feizi'. The common version is that King Xuan of Qi ordered people to play the yu, insisting on a performance by three hundred people. A scholar from Nanguo requested to play the yu for King Xuan, who was pleased and treated him with the same standard as the other hundreds of players. After King Xuan's death, King Min of Qi ascended the throne."

context:
### Idiom: 天无绝人之路
### Meaning: 天下不会断绝人的出路，把人困死。比喻人虽一时处于绝境，但终归可以找到出路。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

Translated by gpt4; Corpus: cc-news
source: 双子座：财运不错，谨记知足常乐，不可贪得无厌。巨蟹座：天无绝人之路，身处逆境也应当保持乐观！狮子座：运势差是暂时性，不去跟人比较会较开心。
target: Gemini: Your financial luck is good, remember to always be content and not be greedy. Cancer: There's always a way out, even in adversity, you should stay optimistic! Leo: Bad luck is temporary, you'll be happier if you don't compare yourself to others.

context:
### Idiom: 能伸能屈
### Meaning: 能弯曲也能伸直。指人在失意时能忍耐，在得志时能大干一番。比喻好坏环境都能适应。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

Translated by alma-13b-lora; Corpus: weibo
target: A great man is one who can bend and not break.

context:
### Idiom: 抱薪救火
### Meaning: 薪柴草。抱着柴草去救火。比喻用错误的方法去消除灾祸，结果使灾祸反而扩大。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

Translated by qwen-14b-chat; Corpus: weibo
source: 大家都只看到违约，却没看到上至高管下至主管纷纷又提了一套京沪豪宅抱薪救火啊。
target: Everybody only sees default, but didn't see from senior management to department heads all bought a set of Beijing-Shanghai luxury villa to hold fire.

context:
### Idiom: 疏财仗义
### Meaning: 疏财以财物分人。讲义气，轻视钱财。多指出钱帮助遭难的人。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

Translated by mt0-13b; Corpus: wikipedia
source: 因在家乡打死人而逃往江州，官府捉不到人便抓了李逵兄长李达顶罪坐牢数年，因此李达对这成日惹事生非的弟弟充满怨恨；李逵到江州后得戴宗收留并收编其做手下狱卒。李逵久闻宋江疏财仗义的名号，视宋江为偶像。宋江因犯重罪被发配江州，吴用写信让戴宗照应，经由戴宗引荐让李逵与宋江结识，宋江见李逵体格粗壮、性格耿直，十分欢喜。
target: Because of his murder in his hometown, the authorities began to capture Lixiao's brother Li Da for several years, so Lixiao was very resentful of his trouble-making brother; when he came to江州, he was taken in by the bandit master Dai宗 and taken in as a prisoner. He heard about the reputation of Sun Jiang for his kindness and compassion, and he viewed him as a hero. Sun Jiang was sent to江州 for a serious crime,吴用 wrote to Dai宗 to ask him to look after him, he was given to Lixiao by Dai宗, who introduced him to Sun Jiang. Sun Jiang was very pleased with Lixiao's physical appearance and modest character.

context:
### Idiom: 竖起脊梁
### Meaning: 比喻振作精神。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

Translated by google_api; Corpus: wikipedia
source: 佛图关南面石壁上还有历代题刻，惟清朝前的十余处刻字多已风化而无法辨识，现在保留的多为晚清、民国期间的题刻，内容多是如《佛图关铭》《佛图关》《清正廉明》《西枕双江》《恩周存殁》《廉明慈爱》等功德、节孝碑铭或一些警句。其中，“佛图关”题字约1米见方，落款“光绪壬申四月”（1882年），为题刻中唯一的阳刻；“学成须报国，临难且忘家”题字据传为冯玉祥所书；“挺起胸膛，竖起脊梁”为蒋介石所书，高2.07米，宽约1.5米，现因山体加固仅可见后4字。2022年，渝中区对部分石刻进行了修复。
target: There are still inscriptions from past dynasties on the stone wall south of Fotuguan. However, most of the inscriptions before the Qing Dynasty have been weathered and cannot be read. Most of the inscriptions preserved now are from the late Qing Dynasty and the Republic of China. Most of the contents are such as "Fotuguan Inscription" ""Fotuguan", "Integrity and Integrity", "Xizhen Shuangjiang", "Ene Zhou Cundi", "Integrity and Love" and other merits, inscriptions of filial piety or some aphorisms. Among them, the inscription "Fotuguan" is about 1 meter square and is inscribed "Guangxu Renshen April" (1882), which is the only positive inscription in the inscription; it is said that the inscription "You must serve your country after studying, and you forget your home when you are in trouble" It was written by Feng Yuxiang; "Stand up your chest, erect your spine" was written by Chiang Kai-shek. It is 2.07 meters high and about 1.5 meters wide. Now only the last four characters are visible due to mountain reinforcement. In 2022, some stone carvings were restored in Yuzhong District.

context:
### Idiom: 罪大恶极
### Meaning: 罪恶大到极点。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

Translated by gpt4; Corpus: wikipedia
source: 《易》说：“出征顺利，斩了首恶，俘获他的同伙。”称扬赞美诛杀罪大恶极之人，那些不归顺的都来归服了。如今甘延寿、陈汤的征伐所引起的震动，即便是《易》的斩杀首恶，《诗》的“雷霆之威”也比不上。
target: The "I Ching" says, "The expedition is successful, the chief evil is beheaded, and his accomplices are captured." It praises the execution of those who commit heinous crimes, and those who do not submit have come to surrender. The tremors caused by the expeditions of Gan Yanshou and Chen Tang now, even the beheading of the chief evil in the "I Ching" and the "mighty thunder" in the "Poetry" can't compare.

context:
### Idiom: 困兽犹斗
### Meaning: 被围困的野兽仍然搏斗。比喻处于绝境仍作竭力挣扎。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

Translated by gpt4; Corpus: wikipedia
source: 封敕文预先设置重兵在壕沟外拦击，战斗从夜里一直打到次日早晨。封敕文与众将士商议说：“困兽犹斗，何况是人。叛军知道他们没有生路，同我们拼死对抗，一定会伤害我们的将士，我们不容易平定他们。
target: Feng Chiwen had arranged for heavy troops to intercept outside the trenches, and the battle lasted from night until the next morning. Feng Chiwen discussed with his generals and soldiers, saying: "Even a trapped beast will fight, let alone humans. The rebel army knows they have no way out, and they will fight us to the death, which will definitely harm our soldiers. It won't be easy for us to quell them."

source: 还得是咱颜淡机灵，打不过就怂，靠山来了就横，真的是能伸能屈啊。笑不活了！
target: We have to be modest, but if we are beaten, we will be timid. We will be arrogant if we have backing. This is really funny!

### Idiom: 疏财仗义
### Meaning: 疏财以财物分人。讲义气，轻视钱财。多指出钱帮助遭难的人。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

Translated by alma-13b-lora; Corpus: wikipedia
source: 因在家乡打死人而逃往江州，官府捉不到人便抓了李逵兄长李达顶罪坐牢数年，因此李达对这成日惹事生非的弟弟充满怨恨；李逵到江州后得戴宗收留并收编其做手下狱卒。李逵久闻宋江疏财仗义的名号，视宋江为偶像。宋江因犯重罪被发配江州，吴用写信让戴宗照应，经由戴宗引荐让李逵与宋江结识，宋江见李逵体格粗壮、性格耿直，十分欢喜。
target: Fleeing to Jiangzhou after killing a man in his hometown, the authorities could not catch him, so they arrested Li Dasheng, Li Dashi’s older brother, and sent him to prison for several years. So Li Dashi was full of hatred for his troublesome younger brother; Li Dashao fled to Jiangzhou and was taken in by Daizong, who then recruited him as his underlings. Li Dashao had heard of Song Jiang’s reputation for being stingy and upright, and he regarded Song Jiang as an idol. Song Jiang had been sent to Jiangzhou for a serious offense, and Wu Yong wrote a letter to Daizong to ask him to help, and through Daizong’s introduction, Li Dashao and Song Jiang met. Song Jiang was very happy to see Li Dashao’s strong body and straightforward personality.

### Idiom: 恢诡谲怪
### Meaning: 指离奇怪异。同恢恑憰怪”。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

Translated by alma-13b-lora; Corpus: weibo
source: 想来 真诚才是必杀技 在这恢诡谲怪的商场 这股清流 方能撼动困局。
target: Sincerity is the ultimate weapon. In this strange and complex market, only this stream can shake the deadlock.

### Idiom: 筋疲力尽
### Meaning: 筋肉疲乏，体力竭尽。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

Translated by alma-13b-lora; Corpus: cc-news
source: 这是他对这张专辑最直接的自评。‘今后直到筋疲力尽为止，都会这样持续记录“日记”吧……’坂本龙一已然接受了自己的命运，预感到了终曲的脚步已近。另外，就是去年12月11日在全球网络播出的钢琴独奏会，这是坂本龙一的最后一场亲自演奏的公开演出，许多乐迷都被当时演出画面中教授消瘦苍白的脸庞所震惊，看哭了无数人。
target: This is his most direct self-evaluation for this album. “I guess I will continue to record the ‘diary’ until I am exhausted. " Sakamoto Ryuichi has already accepted his fate and foresees the end of the road. In addition, the December 11, 2016 piano recital broadcast across the globe through the Internet, the last time Sakamoto Ryuichi played the piano in person in front of the audience, shocked many fans with his gaunt and pale face. Many people cried watching the performance.

context:
### Idiom: 项庄舞剑
### Meaning: 比喻说话和行动的真实意图别有所指。同项庄舞剑，意在沛公”
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

Translated by google_api; Corpus: cc-news
source: 并强调演习要有随时可投入战斗的‘今夜就战’的临战演练。这场美韩联合军演，表面上的假想敌是北韩，但是，鉴于演习地点紧逼辽东半岛和山东半岛，距离北京也还不到1000公里，势必造成中国有‘项庄舞剑，意在沛公’的威胁感。
target: It also emphasized that the drill should have a "fight tonight" pre-combat drill that can be put into battle at any time. On the surface, the imaginary enemy of this US-ROK joint military exercise is North Korea. However, given that the location of the exercise is close to the Liaodong Peninsula and Shandong Peninsula, and is less than 1,000 kilometers away from Beijing, it is bound to cause China to have Xiangzhuang dancing with swords, aiming at Peigong. 'sense of threat.
